XAdcPs Struct Reference

#include <xadcps.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The driver's instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every XADC/ADC device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.


Public Attributes

XAdcPs_Config Config
u32 IsReady

Member Data Documentation

XAdcPs_Config XAdcPs::Config
 

XAdcPs_Config of current device

u32 XAdcPs::IsReady
 

Device is initialized and ready
